txt_en: Always stay young at heart.
txt_cn: 童心永驻。

txt_en: Sweep away hunger, power stands by my side.
txt_cn: 横扫饥饿，战斗力与我同在。

txt_en: Take the first step at becoming the person you were truly meant to be.
txt_cn: 勇敢迈出第一步，探索真正的自我。

txt_en: You should feel nothing but great about what you've done.
txt_cn: 你应该为你的成就感到骄傲。

txt_en: Everyone started off with their own stride, their own pace.
txt_cn: 每个人都有自己的人生节奏。

txt_en: Every mountain is unclimbable until someone climbs it.
txt_cn: 每座山都是高不可攀的，直到有人登顶。

txt_en: I'm not hanging back.
txt_cn: 我绝不会退缩。

txt_en: Experience everything. Live all your dreams.
txt_cn: 肆意生长，尽情圆梦。

txt_en: To struggle against great odds.
txt_cn: 在逆境面前奋力抗争。

txt_en: May you be blessed with happiness, health, prosperity.
txt_cn: 愿你幸福安康，生活富足。

txt_en: Love is rare.
txt_cn: 爱很珍贵。

txt_en: You know how perfect you are to me.
txt_cn: 对我而言，你就是完美的。

txt_en: You have to live your life for you, the real you.
txt_cn: 活出真正的自我。

txt_en: Nothing just happens. It's all part of a plan!
txt_cn: 万事皆有其因果。

txt_en: Sometimes, less is more.
txt_cn: 简单也是另一种美。

txt_en: My dad is my hero.
txt_cn: 父亲是我心里的英雄。

txt_en: A good book is a loyal and constant friend.
txt_cn: 读到一本好书，如同交到挚友。

txt_en: Your life is happening now.
txt_cn: 你的奇遇人生正在开启。

txt_en: Treasure the few years you've got because that's all there is.
txt_cn: 正因余生有限，才更值得珍惜。

txt_en: You are my best friend, the greatest joy in my life.
txt_cn: 你是我最好的朋友，是我生命中最大的快乐。

txt_en: What a beautiful, perfect summer it's been.
txt_cn: 多么美好的夏天啊！

txt_en: Tomorrow can only be better.
txt_cn: 明天会更好。

txt_en: Hope is a good thing, maybe the best of things.
txt_cn: 希望是美好的，也许是世间最美好的。

txt_en: You deserve some joy in your life.
txt_cn: 享受生活的乐趣。
